# AuditKit

> Zero-key website and GitHub repo auditor. Paste a URL, get scored across 6 pillars, download a ZIP of AI agent files pre-written to fix every issue.

## Links

- Repo: https://github.com/nirholas/AuditKit
- Live: https://auditkit.dev
- Docs: https://github.com/nirholas/AuditKit/tree/main/docs

## What it does

1. Accepts a website URL or GitHub repo URL
2. Runs audits in parallel: PageSpeed/Core Web Vitals, SEO, Accessibility, Security headers, Structured Data, AI Readiness
3. Scores each pillar 0–100 with a letter grade
4. Lists actionable issues (critical / warning / info) with fixes
5. Generates a downloadable ZIP containing:
   - `AGENTS.md` — AI agent instructions customised to fix your site's issues
   - `CLAUDE.md` — Claude-specific context
   - `GEMINI.md` — Gemini-specific context
   - `.agents/skills/{pillar}/SKILL.md` — one skill file per problem area
   - `checklists/{pillar}.md` — human-readable checklists
   - `ready-to-deploy/` — `robots.txt`, security headers, JSON-LD structured data

## No API Keys Required

Everything runs with public endpoints. No sign-up, no credits, no rate-limit anxiety.

## Tech Stack

Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, pnpm monorepo, Turborepo
